message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,250. This product offers you significant value, and I believe this price is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
